dimensions.label: Humor Sense
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin perceive humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will understand irony and sarcasm, often using it to make wry observations.
Your FarTwin will enjoy light-hearted jokes and playful teasing, finding humor in everyday situations.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly pursue new experiences and take calculated risks to challenge themselves.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options, avoiding unnecessary risks to ensure stability.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express their feelings, potentially coming across as intense or emotional.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with close confidants.

dimensions.label: Social Status
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin perceive social standing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for recognition and prestige, possibly at the expense of others.
Your FarTwin will downplay their achievements and maintain a humble demeanor.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will directly challenge opposing views, potentially leading to heated debates.
Your FarTwin will seek mutually beneficial solutions, prioritizing cooperation over confrontation.

dimensions.label: Curiosity Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out knowledge, asking questions and seeking clarification.
Your FarTwin will approach new information with a healthy dose of skepticism, requiring convincing evidence before accepting it.

dimensions.label: Perfectionism
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle mistakes?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for flawlessness, revisiting and redoing tasks until they meet their standards.
Your FarTwin will learn from mistakes, incorporating them into future improvements without excessive self-criticism.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin respond to change?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adjust quickly, finding ways to thrive in new environments.
Your FarTwin will resist changes, clinging to familiar routines and preferences.
